abstract: Government officials from the British territory of Gibraltar visited Rio de Janeiro this week to promote its financial stability as well as its access to the European Union and low taxes.
snippet: Government officials from the British territory of Gibraltar visited Rio de Janeiro this week to promote its financial stability as well as its access to the European Union and low taxes.
lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO — Tiny Gibraltar is trying to cash in on Brazil’s rising wealth.

headline.main: Gibraltar Seeks to Woo Brazilian Hedge Funds and Private Equity
